This function produces a python code that SGems will understand to run the specified commands

static so(filename)¶

This code transforms the SGems simulations output into a python readable and exploitable format, given the sgems output file as argument

static transform(f, k_mean, k_std)¶

Transforms the values of the sgems simulations into meaningful data

bel.toolbox.sgems.sgems.joinlist(j, mylist)¶

Function that joins an array of numbers with j as separator. For example, joinlist(‘^’, [1,2]) returns 1^2

bel.toolbox.sgems.sgems.path_leaf(path)¶

Extracts file name from a path name
